Posts.Content: Good luck I’ll think of you on 16 th . Why did you have to have chemo first ? Sorry for being so nosey ?
Posts.Title: Diep

Posts.Content: Thanks so much good luck on Wednesday x
Posts.Title: Diep

Posts.Content: Thanks good luck with yours how are you feeling about it?
Posts.Title: Diep

Posts.Content: Thanks so much sounds very manageable so glad I asked x
Posts.Title: Diep

Posts.Content: That’s basically all I need to know ... so bring it on ! How long was your recovery?
Posts.Title: Diep

Posts.Content: hello would love to hear from anyone who has had mastectomy and reconstruction taken from the abdomen. I haven’t got a date yet but that’s what I’m down for.  I m imagining it’s going to be a testing time but any advice very welcome. thank you
Posts.Title: Diep

Posts.Content: Thank you so much I think it’s all just hitting home now as up until now it’s only been tests and diagnosis... I’ve decided on Diep flap reconstruction which should be on 12 th March . At first it was lumpectomy but then the satellite nodule appeared as a triple negative and now am awaiting information re if I need chemo etc. having the biopsy on Saturday has made me realise it’s all really happening I suppose... and the whole medical team have been lovely but twice now I’ve rung my nurse and she hasn’t got back to me ... I imagine poor woman is rushed off her feet with bigger questions than mine. thank you for replying it does help me to read your comments thank you
Posts.Title: Loneliness with breast cancer

Posts.Content: Thanks how do I get the friends on here I don’t really know how these things work
Posts.Title: Loneliness with breast cancer

Posts.Content: Thanks yes I’ve spoken to them all and been very open... I’m even writing a blog ... I just feel ungrateful and isolated right now as had sentinel node biopsy on Saturday and I know I’m making a right old fuss but I feel I’ve just been left to it ... it’s all the waiting as well that gets to me ... my next appointment isn’t till 4 th March . I’m not sure re my dressings etc and I can’t seem to get a reply from the nurse I was meant to ring .  Thank you so much for taking the time to reassure me I do feel rather self indulgent in my moaning on here please forgive that it’s not meant to be . I really appreciate you taking the time to comment thanks you
Posts.Title: Loneliness with breast cancer

Posts.Content: Thanks I get the big knicker reference totally I’ll pull them up and get on ... had a blip I’m sure I’ll be good once I’m getting treatment it’s the waiting and the rejection from people you thought were friends... and then suddenly all you guys appear which is so fabulous thank you so much xxx
Posts.Title: Loneliness with breast cancer

Posts.Content: Thanks I will decipher your words tomorrow xxx
Posts.Title: Loneliness with breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hi I know I’m being ungrateful as I have a lovely family all looking after me. Some friends have deserted me but others have come up trumps. however despite all the support I feel terribly lonely as I await my Diep flap op and the results of  my lymph node biopsy. Mainly because despite their kindness I feel no one around me knows how I feel! does anyone else feel like the? also I was diagnosed at the start of December but diagnosis changed and it’s all very frustrating not knowing if it’s just a mastectomy or any other treatment. sorry I’m feeling very low and thought maybe someone could say they felt low but it’s ok. I have four teenagers who need my emotional support and a worried husband so  the brave face at home . thanks for listening x
Posts.Title: Loneliness with breast cancer

Posts.Content: Thanks so much I’m just concerned I was discharged on Saturday with no advice re my stitches or dressings and I can’t get in contact with my nurses. I don’t want to make a fuss or pester the hospital any advice what I should do ?
Posts.Title: Loneliness with breast cancer

Posts.Content: Thank you  I’ve been fine until the last few days so it’s wonderful to hear from people thank you x
Posts.Title: Loneliness with breast cancer
